name: CreateTrelloBoard
description:
Create a new board on Trello.

Use this tool to create a new board on Trello when you need to organize tasks or projects. It will return the details of the newly created board, allowing further actions or adjustments.

parameters.name: board_name
parameters.description: The new name for the Trello board. Must be between 1 to 16384 characters.

value_schema.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

parameters.name: board_description
parameters.description: A description for the new board, ranging from 0 to 16384 characters in length.

value_schema.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

parameters.name: workspace_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello Workspace where the board will be created.

value_schema.description: The id or name of the Workspace the board should belong to.

parameters.name: source_board_id
parameters.description: The ID of the board to copy for creating a new board.

value_schema.description: The id of a board to copy into the new board.

parameters.name: include_original_cards
parameters.description: Specify 'cards' to keep cards from the original board when copying; otherwise, omit for none.

value_schema.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value `cards`

parameters.name: enabled_power_ups
parameters.description: Specify the Power-Ups to enable on the board. Options: all, calendar, cardAging, recap, voting.

value_schema.description: The Power-Ups that should be enabled on the new board. One of: `all`, `calendar`, `cardAging`, `recap`, `voting`.

parameters.name: board_permission_level
parameters.description: Set the permission level of the board. Options are: `org`, `private`, `public`.

value_schema.description: The permissions level of the board. One of: `org`, `private`, `public`.

parameters.name: voting_permissions
parameters.description: Specifies who can vote on the board: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, or `public`.

value_schema.description: Who can vote on this board. One of `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

parameters.name: comment_permission
parameters.description: Specify who can comment on cards: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

value_schema.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

parameters.name: invitation_permissions
parameters.description: Specifies who can invite users to join the board. Choose either `admins` or `members`.

value_schema.description: Determines what types of members can invite users to join. One of: `admins`, `members`.

parameters.name: board_background_color
parameters.description: Specify the custom background ID or choose from predefined colors: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey.

value_schema.description: The id of a custom background or one of: `blue`, `orange`, `green`, `red`, `purple`, `pink`, `lime`, `sky`, `grey`.

parameters.name: card_aging_type
parameters.description: Type of card aging on the board: `pirate` or `regular`. Determines visual changes over time when enabled.

value_schema.description: Determines the type of card aging that should take place on the board if card aging is enabled. One of: `pirate`, `regular`.

parameters.name: use_default_labels
parameters.description: Set to true to use the default set of labels on the new board; false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Determines whether to use the default set of labels.

parameters.name: add_default_lists
parameters.description: Add the default lists (To Do, Doing, Done) to a new board. Ignored if `idBoardSource` is provided.

value_schema.description: Determines whether to add the default set of lists to a board (To Do, Doing, Done). It is ignored if `idBoardSource` is provided.

parameters.name: allow_self_join
parameters.description: Set to `true` to allow users to join the board themselves. Set to `false` if they need an invitation.

value_schema.description: Determines whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited.

parameters.name: enable_card_covers
parameters.description: Boolean to determine whether card covers are enabled on the board.

value_schema.description: Determines whether card covers are enabled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

value_schema.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

parameters.name: defaultLabels
parameters.description: Determines whether to use the default set of labels.

value_schema.description: Determines whether to use the default set of labels.

parameters.name: defaultLists
parameters.description: Determines whether to add the default set of lists to a board (To Do, Doing, Done). It is ignored if `idBoardSource` is provided.

value_schema.description: Determines whether to add the default set of lists to a board (To Do, Doing, Done). It is ignored if `idBoardSource` is provided.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

value_schema.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

parameters.name: idOrganization
parameters.description: The id or name of the Workspace the board should belong to.

value_schema.description: The id or name of the Workspace the board should belong to.

parameters.name: idBoardSource
parameters.description: The id of a board to copy into the new board.

value_schema.description: The id of a board to copy into the new board.

parameters.name: keepFromSource
parameters.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value `cards`

value_schema.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value `cards`

parameters.name: powerUps
parameters.description: The Power-Ups that should be enabled on the new board. One of: `all`, `calendar`, `cardAging`, `recap`, `voting`.

value_schema.description: The Power-Ups that should be enabled on the new board. One of: `all`, `calendar`, `cardAging`, `recap`, `voting`.

parameters.name: prefs_permissionLevel
parameters.description: The permissions level of the board. One of: `org`, `private`, `public`.

value_schema.description: The permissions level of the board. One of: `org`, `private`, `public`.

parameters.name: prefs_voting
parameters.description: Who can vote on this board. One of `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

value_schema.description: Who can vote on this board. One of `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

parameters.name: prefs_comments
parameters.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

value_schema.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: `disabled`, `members`, `observers`, `org`, `public`.

parameters.name: prefs_invitations
parameters.description: Determines what types of members can invite users to join. One of: `admins`, `members`.

value_schema.description: Determines what types of members can invite users to join. One of: `admins`, `members`.

parameters.name: prefs_selfJoin
parameters.description: Determines whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited.

value_schema.description: Determines whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited.

parameters.name: prefs_cardCovers
parameters.description: Determines whether card covers are enabled.

value_schema.description: Determines whether card covers are enabled.

parameters.name: prefs_background
parameters.description: The id of a custom background or one of: `blue`, `orange`, `green`, `red`, `purple`, `pink`, `lime`, `sky`, `grey`.

value_schema.description: The id of a custom background or one of: `blue`, `orange`, `green`, `red`, `purple`, `pink`, `lime`, `sky`, `grey`.

parameters.name: prefs_cardAging
parameters.description: Determines the type of card aging that should take place on the board if card aging is enabled. One of: `pirate`, `regular`.

value_schema.description: Determines the type of card aging that should take place on the board if card aging is enabled. One of: `pirate`, `regular`.
